}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            skeletonFrame.CopySkeletonDataTo(_skeletons);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // grab the tracked skeleton and set the playerIndex for use pullingDi2015NewLine            // the depth data out for the silhouette.Di2015NewLine            // TODO: this assumes only a single tracked skeleton, we want to find theDi2015NewLine            // closest person out of the tracked skeletons (see above).Di2015NewLine            this.playerIndex = -1;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < _skeletons.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_skeletons[i].TrackingState != SkeletonTrackingState.NotTracked)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.playerIndex = i+1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void OnDepthFrameReady(object sender, DepthImageFrameReadyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (DepthImageFrame depthFrame = e.OpenDepthImageFrame())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (depthFrame != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // check if the format has changed.Di2015NewLine            bool haveNewFormat = this.lastImageFormat != depthFrame.Format;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (haveNewFormat)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.pixelData = new short[depthFrame.PixelDataLength];Di2015NewLine                this.depthFrame32 = new byte[depthFrame.Width * depthFrame.Height * Bgra32BytesPerPixel];Di2015NewLine                this.convertedDepthBits = new byte[this.depthFrame32.Length];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            depthFrame.CopyPixelDataTo(this.pixelData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i16 = 0, i32 = 0; i16 < pixelData.Length && i32 < depthFrame32.Length; i16++, i32 += 4)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int player = pixelData[i16] & DepthImageFrame.PlayerIndexBitmask;Di2015NewLine                if (player == this.playerIndex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + RedIndex] = 0x44;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + GreenIndex] = 0x23;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + BlueIndex] = 0x59;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + 3] = 0x66;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (player > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + RedIndex] = 0xBC;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + GreenIndex] = 0xBE;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + BlueIndex] = 0xC0;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + 3] = 0x66;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + RedIndex] = 0x0;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + GreenIndex] = 0x0;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + BlueIndex] = 0x0;Di2015NewLine                    convertedDepthBits[i32 + 3] = 0x0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (silhouette == null || haveNewFormat)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                silhouette = new WriteableBitmap(Di2015NewLine                    depthFrame.Width,Di2015NewLine                    depthFrame.Height,Di2015NewLine                    96,Di2015NewLine                    96,Di2015NewLine                    PixelFormats.Bgra32,Di2015NewLine                    null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SilhouetteImage.Source = silhouette;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            silhouette.WritePixels(Di2015NewLine                new Int32Rect(0, 0, depthFrame.Width, depthFrame.Height),Di2015NewLine                convertedDepthBits,Di2015NewLine                depthFrame.Width * Bgra32BytesPerPixel,Di2015NewLine                0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Silhouette = silhouette;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.lastImageFormat = depthFrame.Format;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13805137Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Drawing2D;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Imaging;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ImageResizeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly string directory = Path.GetDirectoryName(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var strFiles = Directory.GetFiles(directory, "*.jpg");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Using parallel processing for performanceDi2015NewLine            Parallel.ForEach(strFiles, strFile =>Di2015NewLine                                           {Di2015NewLine                                               using (var image = Image.FromFile(strFile, true))Di2015NewLine                                               {Di2015NewLine                                                   var exif = image.PropertyItems;Di2015NewLine                                                   var b = directory + "\\\\" + Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(strFile);Di2015NewLine                                                   ResizeImage(image, 800, b + "_FULL.jpg", exif);Di2015NewLine                                                   ResizeImage(image, 200, b + "_THUMB.jpg", exif);Di2015NewLine                                               }Di2015NewLine                                               File.Delete(strFile);Di2015NewLine                                           });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ResizeImage(Image theImage, int newSize, string savePath, IEnumerable<PropertyItem> propertyItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int width;Di2015NewLine                int height;Di2015NewLine                CalculateNewRatio(theImage.Width, theImage.Height, newSize, out width, out height);Di2015NewLine                using (var b = new Bitmap(width, height))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (var g = Graphics.FromImage(b))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        g.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine                        g.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine                        g.PixelOffsetMode = PixelOffsetMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine                        g.DrawImage(theImage, new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Using FileStream to avoid lock issues because of the parallel processingDi2015NewLine                        using (var stream = new FileStream(directory + "\\\\Watermark.png", FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            using (var overLay = Image.FromStream(stream))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                stream.Close();Di2015NewLine                                int newWidth;Di2015NewLine                                int newHeight;Di2015NewLine                                CalculateNewRatio(overLay.Width, overLay.Height, height > width ? width : newSize, out newWidth, out newHeight);Di2015NewLine                                var x = (b.Width - newWidth) / 2;Di2015NewLine                                var y = (b.Height - newHeight) / 2;Di2015NewLine                                g.DrawImage(overLay, new Rectangle(x, y, newWidth, newHeight));Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        var qualityParam = new EncoderParameter(Encoder.Quality, 80L);Di2015NewLine                        var codecs = ImageCodecInfo.GetImageEncoders();Di2015NewLine                        var jpegCodec = codecs.FirstOrDefault(t => t.MimeType == "image/jpeg");Di2015NewLine                        var encoderParams = new EncoderParameters(1);Di2015NewLine                        encoderParams.Param[0] = qualityParam;Di2015NewLine                        foreach (var item in propertyItems)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            b.SetPropertyItem(item);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        b.Save(savePath, jpegCodec, encoderParams);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void CalculateNewRatio(int width, int height, int desiredSize, out int newWidth, out int newHeight)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((width >= height && width > desiredSize) || (width <= height && height > desiredSize))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (width > height)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    newWidth = desiredSize;Di2015NewLine                    newHeight = height*newWidth/width;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (width < height)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    newHeight = desiredSize;Di2015NewLine                    newWidth = width*newHeight/height;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    newWidth = desiredSize;Di2015NewLine                    newHeight = desiredSize;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newWidth = width;Di2015NewLine                newHeight = height;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13805790Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Traverse<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queue = new Queue<T>(source);Di2015NewLine    while (queue.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var item = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var child in childSelector(item))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            queue.Enqueue(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> Traverse<T>(T root, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Traverse(new[] { root }, childSelector);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13806300Di2015UniqueSeparatorCX509CertificateRequestCertificate
13806300Di2015UniqueSeparatorcertenroll.dll
13806300Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static X509Certificate2 CreateSelfSignedCertificate(string subjectName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create DN for subject and issuerDi2015NewLine    var dn = new CX500DistinguishedName();Di2015NewLine    dn.Encode("CN=" + subjectName, X500NameFlags.XCN_CERT_NAME_STR_NONE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create a new private key for the certificateDi2015NewLine    CX509PrivateKey privateKey = new CX509PrivateKey();Di2015NewLine    privateKey.ProviderName = "Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider v1.0";Di2015NewLine    privateKey.MachineContext = true;Di2015NewLine    privateKey.Length = 2048;Di2015NewLine    privateKey.KeySpec = X509KeySpec.XCN_AT_SIGNATURE; // use is not limitedDi2015NewLine    privateKey.ExportPolicy = X509PrivateKeyExportFlags.XCN_NCRYPT_ALLOW_PLAINTEXT_EXPORT_FLAG;Di2015NewLine    privateKey.Create();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use the stronger SHA512 hashing algorithmDi2015NewLine    var hashobj = new CObjectId();Di2015NewLine    hashobj.InitializeFromAlgorithmName(ObjectIdGroupId.XCN_CRYPT_HASH_ALG_OID_GROUP_ID,Di2015NewLine        ObjectIdPublicKeyFlags.XCN_CRYPT_OID_INFO_PUBKEY_ANY, Di2015NewLine        AlgorithmFlags.AlgorithmFlagsNone, "SHA512");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add extended key usage if you want - look at MSDN for a list of possible OIDsDi2015NewLine    var oid = new CObjectId();Di2015NewLine    oid.InitializeFromValue("1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.1"); // SSL serverDi2015NewLine    var oidlist = new CObjectIds();Di2015NewLine    oidlist.Add(oid);Di2015NewLine    var eku = new CX509ExtensionEnhancedKeyUsage();Di2015NewLine    eku.InitializeEncode(oidlist); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the self signing requestDi2015NewLine    var cert = new CX509CertificateRequestCertificate();Di2015NewLine    cert.InitializeFromPrivateKey(X509CertificateEnrollmentContext.ContextMachine, privateKey, "");Di2015NewLine    cert.Subject = dn;Di2015NewLine    cert.Issuer = dn; // the issuer and the subject are the sameDi2015NewLine    cert.NotBefore = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine    // this cert expires immediately. Change to whatever makes sense for youDi2015NewLine    cert.NotAfter = DateTime.Now; Di2015NewLine    cert.X509Extensions.Add((CX509Extension)eku); // add the EKUDi2015NewLine    cert.HashAlgorithm = hashobj; // Specify the hashing algorithmDi2015NewLine    cert.Encode(); // encode the certificateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Do the final enrollment processDi2015NewLine    var enroll = new CX509Enrollment();Di2015NewLine    enroll.InitializeFromRequest(cert); // load the certificateDi2015NewLine    enroll.CertificateFriendlyName = subjectName; // Optional: add a friendly nameDi2015NewLine    string csr = enroll.CreateRequest(); // Output the request in base64Di2015NewLine    // and install it back as the responseDi2015NewLine    enroll.InstallResponse(InstallResponseRestrictionFlags.AllowUntrustedCertificate,Di2015NewLine        csr, EncodingType.XCN_CRYPT_STRING_BASE64, ""); // no passwordDi2015NewLine    // output a base64 encoded PKCS#12 so we can import it back to the .Net security classesDi2015NewLine    var base64encoded = enroll.CreatePFX("", // no password, this is for internal consumptionDi2015NewLine        PFXExportOptions.PFXExportChainWithRoot);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // instantiate the target class with the PKCS#12 data (and the empty password)Di2015NewLine    return new System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2(Di2015NewLine        System.Convert.FromBase64String(base64encoded), "", Di2015NewLine        // mark the private key as exportable (this is usually what you want to do)Di2015NewLine        System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags.ExportableDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13806311Di2015UniqueSeparatorResponse.Clear();Di2015NewLineResponse.AddHeader("content-disposition", string.Format("attachment;filename=file_{0}.csv", batchId));Di2015NewLineResponse.ContentType = "text/csv";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (SqlDataReader rdr= GetDataForCSV())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (rdr.Read())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       Response.Write(CSVFromIDataRecord(rdr));Di2015NewLine       Response.Write("\\n");Di2015NewLine       if (i % 50 == 0)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           //flush the output stream every now and thenDi2015NewLine           Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    rdr.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineResponse.End();Di2015NewLine

13808354Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing Excel = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DTEExcelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ExcelApplicationRetrieverDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [DllImport("Oleacc.dll")]Di2015NewLine        public static extern int AccessibleObjectFromWindow(Di2015NewLine              int hwnd, uint dwObjectID, byte[] riid,Di2015NewLine              ref Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Window ptr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("User32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        public static extern int GetClassName(Di2015NewLine              int hWnd, StringBuilder lpClassName, int nMaxCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("User32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        public static extern bool EnumChildWindows(Di2015NewLine              int hWndParent, EnumChildCallback lpEnumFunc,Di2015NewLine              ref int lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public delegate bool EnumChildCallback(int hwnd, ref int lParam);Di2015NewLine        private EnumChildCallback cb;Di2015NewLine        public Excel.Application xl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ExcelApplicationRetriever(int winHandle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We need to enumerate the child windows to find one thatDi2015NewLine            // supports accessibility. To do this, instantiate theDi2015NewLine            // delegate and wrap the callback method in it, then callDi2015NewLine            // EnumChildWindows, passing the delegate as the 2nd arg.Di2015NewLine            if (winHandle != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int hwndChild = 0;Di2015NewLine                cb = new EnumChildCallback(EnumChildProc);Di2015NewLine                EnumChildWindows(winHandle, cb, ref hwndChild);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If we found an accessible child window, callDi2015NewLine                // AccessibleObjectFromWindow, passing the constantDi2015NewLine                // OBJID_NATIVEOM (defined in winuser.h) andDi2015NewLine                // IID_IDispatch - we want an IDispatch pointerDi2015NewLine                // into the native object model.Di2015NewLine                if (hwndChild != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    const uint OBJID_NATIVEOM = 0xFFFFFFF0;Di2015NewLine                    Guid IID_IDispatch = new Guid(Di2015NewLine                         "{00020400-0000-0000-C000-000000000046}");Di2015NewLine                    Excel.Window ptr = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    int hr = AccessibleObjectFromWindow(Di2015NewLine                          hwndChild, OBJID_NATIVEOM,Di2015NewLine                         IID_IDispatch.ToByteArray(), ref ptr);Di2015NewLine                    if (hr >= 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // If we successfully got a native OMDi2015NewLine                        // IDispatch pointer, we can QI this forDi2015NewLine                        // an Excel Application (using the implicitDi2015NewLine                        // cast operator supplied in the PIA).Di2015NewLine                        xl = ptr.Application;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool EnumChildProc(int hwndChild, ref int lParam)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder(128);Di2015NewLine            GetClassName(hwndChild, buf, 128);Di2015NewLine            if (buf.ToString() == "EXCEL7")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lParam = hwndChild;Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13812527Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int CombineHashCodes(params int[] hashCodes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (hashCodes == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("hashCodes");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hashCodes.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hashCodes.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return hashCodes[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = hashCodes[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 1; i < hashCodes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = CombineHashCodes(result, hashCodes[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int CombineHashCodes(int h1, int h2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (h1 << 5) + h1 ^ h2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // another implementationDi2015NewLine    //uncheckedDi2015NewLine    //{Di2015NewLine    //    var hash = 17;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //    hash = hash * 23 + h1;Di2015NewLine    //    hash = hash * 23 + h2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //    return hash;Di2015NewLine    //}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13813579Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InputHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region Static MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines whether the key value pressed originated from the SIPDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="keyValue">The key value.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="handle">The widget handle.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    ///   <c>true</c> if is sip key press; otherwise, <c>false</c>.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsSipKeyPress(int keyValue, IntPtr handle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        NativeMessage m;Di2015NewLine        if (PeekMessage(out m, handle, 0, 0, PM_NOREMOVE))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // All SIP inputs have LParam of 1, so ignore theseDi2015NewLine            if (m.msg == WM_CHAR && m.wParam == (IntPtr)keyValue && m.lParam == (IntPtr)1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region P-InvokeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const uint PM_NOREMOVE = 0x0000;Di2015NewLine    const uint WM_CHAR = 258;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("coredll.dll")]Di2015NewLine    [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine    static extern bool PeekMessage(out NativeMessage lpMsg, IntPtr hWnd, uint wMsgFilterMin, uint wMsgFilterMax, uint wRemoveMsg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    public struct NativeMessageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public IntPtr handle;Di2015NewLine        public uint msg;Di2015NewLine        public IntPtr wParam;Di2015NewLine        public IntPtr lParam;Di2015NewLine        public uint time;Di2015NewLine        public System.Drawing.Point p;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13818315Di2015UniqueSeparatorTreeNode
13818315Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace WpfApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TreeNode root = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine            root.Header = "root";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tree1.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add node to tree before adding handlers, or you'll getDi2015NewLine            // a StackOverflowExceptionDi2015NewLine            tree1.Items.Add(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            root.AddHandler(TreeNode.ExpandedEvent, new RoutedEventHandler(expandedHandler));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void expandedHandler(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e) { newNodeCopyExpandedHandlers(sender as TreeNode); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void newNodeCopyExpandedHandlers(TreeNode node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode newNode = new TreeNode();Di2015NewLine            newNode.Header = "nuovo!";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add node to tree before adding handlers, or you'll getDi2015NewLine            // a StackOverflowExceptionDi2015NewLine            tree1.Items.Add(newNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Delegate d in newNode.GetHandlers(node, TreeNode.ExpandedEvent))Di2015NewLine                newNode.AddHandler(TreeNode.ExpandedEvent, d);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TreeNode : TreeViewItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<RoutedEvent, List<Delegate>> handlersList = new Dictionary<RoutedEvent, List<Delegate>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public new void AddHandler(RoutedEvent e, Delegate d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!handlersList.ContainsKey(e)) handlersList.Add(e, new List<Delegate>());Di2015NewLine            handlersList[e].Add(d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            base.AddHandler(e, d);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public new void RemoveHandler(RoutedEvent e, Delegate d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!handlersList.ContainsKey(e)) handlersList.Add(e, new List<Delegate>());Di2015NewLine            if (handlersList[e].Contains(d)) handlersList[e].Remove(d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            base.RemoveHandler(e, d);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public List<Delegate> GetHandlers(TreeNode n, RoutedEvent e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (n.handlersList.ContainsKey(e)) return n.handlersList[e];Di2015NewLine            else return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13823123Di2015UniqueSeparator//sealed so we don't have to implement full IDisposable patternDi2015NewLinesealed class Q:IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private CancellationTokenSource cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine    private BlockingCollection<Action> queue =Di2015NewLine        new BlockingCollection<Action>(new ConcurrentQueue<Action>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Q()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Thread(() => RunQueue()).Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void RunQueue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while(!cts.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Action action;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //lovely... blocks until something is availableDi2015NewLine                //so we don't need to deal with messy synchronizationDi2015NewLine                action = queue.Take(cts.Token); Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch(OperationCanceledException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddJob(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            queue.Add(action,cts.Token);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(OperationCanceledException e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ObjectDisposedException("Q is disposed",e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(!cts.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13823123Di2015UniqueSeparatorQ actionQueue=new Q();Di2015NewLineactionQueue.AddJob(() => Console.WriteLine("action1"));Di2015NewLineactionQueue.AddJob(() => Console.WriteLine("action2"));Di2015NewLineactionQueue.AddJob(() => Console.WriteLine("action3"));Di2015NewLine

13823803Di2015UniqueSeparator    string test = "3, 7, 12-14, 1, 5-6";Di2015NewLine    var items = test.Split(',');Di2015NewLine    var ints = items.SelectMany(item => Expand(item));Di2015NewLine    string result = string.Join(", ", ints.OrderBy(i => i).ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<int> Expand(string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (str.Contains('-'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var range = str.Split('-');Di2015NewLine            int begin = int.Parse(range[0]);Di2015NewLine            int end = int.Parse(range[1]);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = begin; i <= end; i++)Di2015NewLine                yield return i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            yield return int.Parse(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

       var page = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get all rights that use this screen.Di2015NewLine            // Waiting for nonstale pageSize)Di2015NewLine                                .Take(pageSize)Di2015NewLine                                .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var right in screenId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // You might want to delete any empty rights declarationsDi2015NewLine                if (right.ScreenRights.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine (rights.Count < pageSize)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Next page please.Di2015NewLine            page++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13824671Di2015UniqueSeparator// get the BitmapImageDi2015NewLinevar image = new BitmapImage(new Uri(path));Di2015NewLineif (image.PixelHeight != image.PixelWidth) return;Di2015NewLineDimension = image.PixelHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// copy to byte arrayDi2015NewLineint stride = image.PixelWidth * 4;Di2015NewLinebyte[] buffer = new byte[stride * image.PixelHeight];Di2015NewLineimage.CopyPixels(buffer, stride, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// create a bitmapDi2015NewLinevar bitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(image.PixelWidth, image.PixelHeight, System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// lock bitmap dataDi2015NewLineSystem.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData bitmapData = bitmap.LockBits(new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, bitmap.Width, bitmap.Height), System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, bitmap.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// copy byte array to bitmap dataDi2015NewLineSystem.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(buffer, 0, bitmapData.Scan0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// unlockDi2015NewLinebitmap.UnlockBits(bitmapData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// copy to Color arrayDi2015NewLinevar colors = new Color[Dimension, Dimension];Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < bitmap.Height; i++)Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < bitmap.Width; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mediacolor = bitmap.GetPixel(i, j);Di2015NewLine        var drawingcolor = Color.FromArgb(mediacolor.A, mediacolor.R, mediacolor.G, mediacolor.B);Di2015NewLine        colors[i, j] = drawingcolor;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13830519Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string ToStringExtended<T>(this Enum e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!(e.GetType().GetCustomAttributes(typeof(FlagsAttribute), true).Length > 0))Di2015NewLine            return e.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<string> eNames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (T fish in Enum.GetValues(typeof(T)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Enum num = fish as Enum;Di2015NewLine            if (e.HasFlag(num) && Convert.ToInt32(fish) != 0 && Convert.ToInt32(fish) != Convert.ToInt32(e))Di2015NewLine                eNames.Add(fish.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return eNames.Count > 1 ? String.Join("|", eNames.ToArray()) : e.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13831529Di2015UniqueSeparator    private const int FILE_SHARE_READ = 1;Di2015NewLine    private const int FILE_SHARE_WRITE = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const int CREATION_DISPOSITION_OPEN_EXISTING = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const int FILE_FLAG_BACKUP_SEMANTICS = 0x02000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa364962%28VS.85%29.aspxDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", EntryPoint = "GetFinalPathNameByHandleW", CharSet = CharSet.Unicode, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int GetFinalPathNameByHandle(IntPtr handle, [In, Out] StringBuilder path, int bufLen, int flags);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa363858(VS.85).aspxDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", EntryPoint = "CreateFileW", CharSet = CharSet.Unicode, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    public static extern SafeFileHandle CreateFile(string lpFileName, int dwDesiredAccess, int dwShareMode,Di2015NewLine    IntPtr SecurityAttributes, int dwCreationDisposition, int dwFlagsAndAttributes, IntPtr hTemplateFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetSymbolicLinkTarget(this FileSystemInfo symlink)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SafeFileHandle fileHandle = CreateFile(symlink.FullName, 0, 2, System.IntPtr.Zero, CREATION_DISPOSITION_OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_FLAG_BACKUP_SEMANTICS, System.IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        if (fileHandle.IsInvalid)Di2015NewLine            throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder path = new StringBuilder(512);Di2015NewLine        int size = GetFinalPathNameByHandle(fileHandle.DangerousGetHandle(), path, path.Capacity, 0);Di2015NewLine        if (size < 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine        // The remarks section of GetFinalPathNameByHandle mentions the return being prefixed with "\\\\?\\"Di2015NewLine        // More information about "\\\\?\\" here -> http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa365247(v=VS.85).aspxDi2015NewLine        if (path[0] == '\\\\' && path[1] == '\\\\' && path[2] == '?' && path[3] == '\\\\')Di2015NewLine            return path.ToString().Substring(4);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return path.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13834676Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyRouteConstraint : IRouteConstraintDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public readonly IList<string> KnownActions = new List<string> Di2015NewLine       { "Send", "Find", ... }; // explicit action namesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public bool Match(System.Web.HttpContextBase httpContext, Route routeDi2015NewLine                  , string parameterName, RouteValueDictionary valuesDi2015NewLine                  , RouteDirection routeDirection)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // for now skip the Url generationDi2015NewLine    if (routeDirection.Equals(RouteDirection.UrlGeneration))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return false; // leave it on defaultDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // try to find out our parametersDi2015NewLine    string action = values["action"].ToString();Di2015NewLine    string id = values["id"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // id and action were provided?Di2015NewLine    var bothProvided = !(string.IsNullOrEmpty(action) || string.IsNullOrEmpty(id));Di2015NewLine    if (bothProvided)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return false; // leave it on defaultDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var isKnownAction = KnownActions.Contains(actionDi2015NewLine                           , StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // action is knownDi2015NewLine    if (isKnownAction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return false; // leave it on defaultDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // action is not known, id was foundDi2015NewLine    values["action"] = "Index"; // change actionDi2015NewLine    values["id"] = action; // use the idDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

against the Mirror Instance */Di2015NewLineUSE masterDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineCREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Password!'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineCREATE CERTIFICATE For Windows logins,Di2015NewLine*  use the Grant Login instead of Create LoginDi2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineCREATE LOGIN HOST_MIRR_login WITH PASSWORD = 'Password!'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineCREATE USER HOST_MIRR_user FOR LOGIN HOST_MIRR_loginDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineCREATE CERTIFICATE HOST_MIRR_certDi2015NewLineAUTHORIZATION HOST_MIRR_userDi2015NewLineFROM FILE = 'D:\\certificate\\HOST_MIRR_cert.cer'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineGRANT CONNECT ON ENDPOINT::End_Mirroring TO [HOST_MIRR_login]Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStep 9: Create the Mirrored Database on the Mirror Server using backups from the Principal ServerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLine*  Execute this against the Principal Instance.Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineUSE MASTERDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineBACKUP DATABASE MirrorDBDi2015NewLine    TO DISK = 'D:\\Backups\\MirrorDB_FullBackup.bak'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineBACKUP LOG MirrorDBDi2015NewLine    TO DISK = 'D:\\Backups\\MirrorDB_LogBackup.trn'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLine*  Copy MirrorDB_FullBackup.bak and MirrorDB_LogBackup.trn to theDi2015NewLine*  Mirror Server.Di2015NewLine*  Execute this against the Mirror Instance.Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineUSE MASTERDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineRESTORE DATABASE MirrorDBDi2015NewLine    FROM DISK = 'D:\\Backups\\MirrorDB_FullBackup.bak'Di2015NewLine    WITH NORECOVERYDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineRESTORE LOG MirrorDBDi2015NewLine    FROM DISK = 'D:\\Backups\\MirrorDB_LogBackup.trn'Di2015NewLine    WITH NORECOVERYDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStep 10: Setup MirroringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLine*  Execute this against the Mirror Instance.Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineALTER DATABASE MirrorDBDi2015NewLine    SET PARTNER = 'TCP://<<your principal server name here>>:5022'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine/*Di2015NewLine*  Execute this against the Principal Instance.Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLineALTER DATABASE MirrorDBDi2015NewLine    SET PARTNER = 'TCP://<<your mirror server name here>>:5023'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineALTER DATABASE MirrorDBDi2015NewLine    SET WITNESS = 'TCP://<<your witness server name here>>:5024'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineAt this point your Database Mirroring should be up and running. You can use the Database Mirroring Monitor to verify the setup as well as to monitor the Synchronization status.Di2015NewLine
13837543Di2015UniqueSeparator<!-- library for doing password hashing, base64 eoncoding / decoding -->Di2015NewLine<script src="http://crypto-js.googlecode.com/svn/tags/3.0.2/build/components/core-min.js"></script>Di2015NewLine<script src="http://crypto-js.googlecode.com/svn/tags/3.0.2/build/components/enc-base64-min.js"></script>Di2015NewLine<script src="http://crypto-js.googlecode.com/svn/tags/3.0.2/build/rollups/sha256.js"></script>Di2015NewLine
13837543Di2015UniqueSeparator// This function takes a base64 string, hashes it with the SHA256 algorithmDi2015NewLine// and returns a base64 string. Di2015NewLinefunction hashBase64StringAndReturnBase64String(str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Take the base64 string and parse it into a javascript variableDi2015NewLine    var words  = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse(str);Di2015NewLine    // Create the hash using the CryptoJS implementation of the SHA256 algorithmDi2015NewLine    var hash = CryptoJS.SHA256(words);Di2015NewLine    var outString =  hash.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Base64)Di2015NewLine    // Display what you just got and return itDi2015NewLine    console.log("Output string is: " + outString);Di2015NewLine    return outString;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

& CStr(.Revision)Di2015NewLine  End With 'AppDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub Form_Resize()Di2015NewLine  Dim sngWidth As SingleDi2015NewLine  Dim sngTxtHeight As Sub cmdSend_Click()Di2015NewLine  ReadReg "D8013", 7  'sec,min,hr,day,month,year,dayofweekDi2015NewLine  ReadReg "R3310", 10 '10 data registersDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub ReadReg(strReg As String, intNr As Integer)Di2015NewLine  Dim strCmd As StringDi2015NewLine  If NotBusy ThenDi2015NewLine    strCmd = "00FFWR0" & strReg & Right$("00" & Hex$(intNr), 2)Di2015NewLine    strCmd = Chr$(5) & strCmd & GetSum(strCmd)Di2015NewLine    With comFXDi2015NewLine      If .PortOpen = False Then CommOpenDi2015NewLine      .Output = strCmdDi2015NewLine    End With 'comFXDi2015NewLine    mblnBusy = TrueDi2015NewLine  End IfDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub CommOpen()Di2015NewLine  With comFXDi2015NewLine    If .PortOpen = True Then .PortOpen = FalseDi2015NewLine    .CommPort = 1Di2015NewLine    .Settings = "19200,N,8,1"Di2015NewLine    .RThreshold = 1Di2015NewLine    .PortOpen = TrueDi2015NewLine  End With 'comFXDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function NotBusy() As BooleanDi2015NewLine  Dim lngTimeout As LongDi2015NewLine  Dim blnResult As BooleanDi2015NewLine  blnResult = TrueDi2015NewLine  lngTimeout = GetTickCount + 1000 'timeout after being busy for 1 secondDi2015NewLine  Do While mblnBusyDi2015NewLine    DoEventsDi2015NewLine    If GetTickCount > lngTimeout ThenDi2015NewLine      blnResult = FalseDi2015NewLine      Exit DoDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine  LoopDi2015NewLine  NotBusy = blnResultDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub comFX_OnComm()Di2015NewLine  Dim strInput As StringDi2015NewLine  Select Case comFX.CommEventDi2015NewLine    Case comEvReceiveDi2015NewLine      strInput = comFX.InputDi2015NewLine      mstrData = mstrData & strInputDi2015NewLine      ProcessDataDi2015NewLine  End SelectDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub ProcessData()Di2015NewLine  'answer : ^02 00FF <data registers 4 characters per reg> ^03Di2015NewLine  Dim lngStart As Long, lngEnd As LongDi2015NewLine  Dim strHead As String, strSum As StringDi2015NewLine  Dim strEnd As StringDi2015NewLine  Dim strData As StringDi2015NewLine  lngStart = InStr(mstrData, Chr$(2))Di2015NewLine  If lngStart > 0 ThenDi2015NewLine    strEnd = Chr$(3)Di2015NewLine    lngEnd = InStr(lngStart, mstrData, strEnd)Di2015NewLine    If lngEnd > 0 ThenDi2015NewLine      strHead = Mid$(mstrData, lngStart + 1, 4)Di2015NewLine      If strHead = "00FF" ThenDi2015NewLine        strData = Mid$(mstrData, lngStart + 1, lngEnd - lngStart)Di2015NewLine        strSum = Mid$(mstrData, lngEnd + 1, 2)Di2015NewLine        If CheckSum(strData, strSum) ThenDi2015NewLine          mstrData = Mid$(mstrData, lngEnd + 3)Di2015NewLine          ShowData Mid$(strData, 5, Len(strData) - 5)Di2015NewLine          mblnBusy = FalseDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine      End IfDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine  End IfDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function CheckSum(strData As String, strSum As String) As BooleanDi2015NewLine  If strSum = GetSum(strData) ThenDi2015NewLine    CheckSum = TrueDi2015NewLine  ElseDi2015NewLine    CheckSum = FalseDi2015NewLine  End IfDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function GetSum(strCmd As String) As StringDi2015NewLine  Dim intChar As IntegerDi2015NewLine  Dim lngSum As LongDi2015NewLine  lngSum = 0Di2015NewLine  For intChar = 1 To Len(strCmd)Di2015NewLine    lngSum = lngSum + Asc(Mid$(strCmd, intChar, 1))Di2015NewLine  Next intCharDi2015NewLine  GetSum = Right$("00" + Hex$(lngSum), 2)Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub ShowData(strData As String)Di2015NewLine  txtShow.SelText = strData & vbCrLfDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

13840231Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<FxCopErrorCodes> GetMatchingValues(FxCopErrorCodes enumValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Special case for 0, as it always match using the bitwise AND operationDi2015NewLine    if (enumValue == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return FxCopErrorCodes.NoErrors;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets list of possible values for the enumDi2015NewLine    var values = Enum.GetValues(typeof(FxCopErrorCodes)).Cast<FxCopErrorCodes>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Iterates over values and return those that matchDi2015NewLine    foreach (var value in values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value > 0 && (enumValue & value) == value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13845675Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Batch<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sourceDi2015NewLine    , int batchSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //TODO validate parametersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<T> buffer = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer.Add(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (buffer.Count >= batchSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return buffer;Di2015NewLine            buffer = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (buffer.Count >= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return buffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13848170Di2015UniqueSeparator   private void ComputeProjections(Image<Bgr, byte> inputImage)Di2015NewLine    {                        Di2015NewLine        Image<Gray, Byte> inputGrayImage = inputImage.Convert<Gray, Byte>();Di2015NewLine        Matrix<float> imgMatHorizontal = new Matrix<float>(inputGrayImage.Height, 1, 1);Di2015NewLine        Matrix<float> imgMatVertical = new Matrix<float>(1, inputGrayImage.Width, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        inputGrayImage.Reduce<float>(imgMatHorizontal, REDUCE_DIMENSION.SINGLE_COL, REDUCE_TYPE.CV_REDUCE_AVG);Di2015NewLine        inputGrayImage.Reduce<float>(imgMatVertical, REDUCE_DIMENSION.SINGLE_ROW, REDUCE_TYPE.CV_REDUCE_AVG);Di2015NewLine        double minH, maxH, minV, maxV;Di2015NewLine        Point minLocH, maxLocH, minLocV, maxLocV;Di2015NewLine        imgMatHorizontal.MinMax(out minH, out maxH, out minLocH, out maxLocH);Di2015NewLine        imgMatVertical.MinMax(out minV, out maxV, out minLocV, out maxLocV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Image<Gray, Byte> maskProvaH = new Image<Gray, byte>(new Size((int)(maxH - minH + 1), imgMatHorizontal.Rows));Di2015NewLine        Image<Gray, Byte> maskProvaV = new Image<Gray, byte>(new Size(imgMatVertical.Cols, (int)(maxV - minV + 1)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < imgMatVertical.Cols; i++)Di2015NewLine            maskProvaV.Draw(new CircleF(new PointF(i, (float)(imgMatVertical[0, i] - minV)), 1f), new Gray(255), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        inputImage.Draw(new CircleF(new PointF(minLocV.X, minLocH.Y), 2), new Bgr(Color.Green), 1);Di2015NewLine        //imageBoxProjected.Image = inputGrayImage;Di2015NewLine        imageBoxHorizProj.Image = maskProvaH;Di2015NewLine        //imageBoxVerticProj.Image = maskProvaV;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13848722Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LoggingInterceptor : IInterceptorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ILoggerFactory _loggerFactory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public LoggingInterceptor(ILoggerFactory loggerFactory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _loggerFactory = loggerFactory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Intercept(IInvocation invocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var logger = _loggerFactory.Create(invocation.TargetType);Di2015NewLine        if (logger.IsDebugEnabled)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            logger.Debug(CreateInvocationLogString(invocation));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            invocation.Proceed();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            logger.Warn(CreateInvocationLogString(invocation));Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        logger.Info(CreateInvocationLogString(invocation));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static String CreateInvocationLogString(IInvocation invocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder(100);Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("Called: {0}.{1}(", invocation.TargetType.Name, invocation.Method.Name);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var argument in invocation.Arguments)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var argumentDescription = argument == null ? "null" : argument.ToString();Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(argumentDescription).Append(",");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (invocation.Arguments.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Length--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(")");Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13851349Di2015UniqueSeparator// BREAKING CHANGE v2 > v1.x - No more correction for time drift based on absolute time. ThisDi2015NewLine//                             didn't work for large period values anyway; the fractionalDi2015NewLine//                             error exceeded corrections. Also complicated dealing with systemDi2015NewLine//                             clock change conditions and caused numerous bugs.Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// - For more precise scheduling, use a custom scheduler that measures TimeSpan values in aDi2015NewLine//   better way, e.g. spinning to make up for the last part of the period. Whether or not theDi2015NewLine//   values of the TimeSpan period match NT time or wall clock time is up to the scheduler.Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// - For more accurate scheduling wrt the system clock, use Generate with DateTimeOffset timeDi2015NewLine//   selectors. When the system clock changes, intervals will not be the same as diffs betweenDi2015NewLine//   consecutive absolute time values. The precision will be low (1s range by default).Di2015NewLine

13852689Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int SIZE_OF_BUFFER = 1024 * 16;Di2015NewLine    private const string FILE_PATH_ORIGINAL = @"C:\\test.xlsx",Di2015NewLine                        FILE_PATH_WithId = @"C:\\test1.xlsx",Di2015NewLine                        FILE_PATH_IdRemoved = @"C:\\test2.xlsx";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly byte[] idbyte = UnicodeEncoding.Default.GetBytes("b669fd8c904d48e0945c16cac1dc5ed9");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AddGuidToFile(FILE_PATH_ORIGINAL, FILE_PATH_WithId);Di2015NewLine        RemoveGuidToFile(FILE_PATH_WithId, FILE_PATH_IdRemoved);Di2015NewLine        CompairFiles(FILE_PATH_ORIGINAL, FILE_PATH_IdRemoved);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void AddGuidToFile(string sourceFilePath, string destinationFilePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[SIZE_OF_BUFFER];Di2015NewLine        FileStream input = new FileStream(sourceFilePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read),Di2015NewLine                    output = new FileStream(destinationFilePath, FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine        int read;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while ((read = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)   //Copy source file to destination file.Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            output.Write(idbyte, 0, idbyte.Length);                     //Add guid to the end of the destination file.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Close filesDi2015NewLine            input.Close();Di2015NewLine            output.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void RemoveGuidToFile(string sourceFilePath, string destinationFilePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] currentBuffer = new byte[SIZE_OF_BUFFER],Di2015NewLine                nextBuffer = new byte[SIZE_OF_BUFFER],Di2015NewLine                tempBuffer;Di2015NewLine        FileStream input = new FileStream(sourceFilePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read),Di2015NewLine                    output = new FileStream(destinationFilePath, FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine        int currentRead,Di2015NewLine            nextRead = 0;                                       //Initialize to 0 incase file's lenght is less then SizeOfBuffer.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentRead = input.Read(currentBuffer, 0, currentBuffer.Length);   //Get first chunk.Di2015NewLine            if (currentRead == currentBuffer.Length)                            //If first chunck is a full buffer then loop until it is not.Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                nextRead = input.Read(nextBuffer, 0, nextBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (nextRead > idbyte.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.Write(currentBuffer, 0, currentRead);                //Since nextBuffer is large enough to contain the ID, write the current buffer out.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Swap buffers.Di2015NewLine                    tempBuffer = currentBuffer;Di2015NewLine                    currentBuffer = nextBuffer;Di2015NewLine                    nextBuffer = tempBuffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Update counts and fill next buffer.Di2015NewLine                    currentRead = nextRead;Di2015NewLine                    nextRead = input.Read(nextBuffer, 0, nextBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            currentRead += nextRead - idbyte.Length;                            //Update currentRead to be the number of bytes in the buffer which are not part of the ID.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            output.Write(currentBuffer, 0, currentRead);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Close filesDi2015NewLine            input.Close();Di2015NewLine            output.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void CompairFiles(string originalFilePath, string idRemovedFilePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] originalBuffer = new byte[SIZE_OF_BUFFER],Di2015NewLine                idRemovedBuffer = new byte[SIZE_OF_BUFFER];Di2015NewLine        FileStream original = new FileStream(originalFilePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read),Di2015NewLine                    idRemoved = new FileStream(idRemovedFilePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine        int originalRead,Di2015NewLine            idRemovedRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                originalRead = original.Read(originalBuffer, 0, originalBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                idRemovedRead = idRemoved.Read(idRemovedBuffer, 0, idRemovedBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (originalRead != idRemovedRead) { throw new Exception("Error: file sizes do not match.  originalRead = " + originalRead + ", idRemovedRead = " + idRemovedRead + ", SIZE_OF_BUFFER = " + SIZE_OF_BUFFER); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < originalRead; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (originalBuffer[i] != idRemovedBuffer[i]) { throw new Exception("Error: file contents do not match.  i = " + i + ",inputBuffer[i] = " + originalBuffer[i] + ", idRemovedBuffer[i] = " + idRemovedBuffer[i]); }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (originalRead == idRemovedRead && originalRead > 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Close filesDi2015NewLine            original.Close();Di2015NewLine            idRemoved.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13854407Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string DecodeProductKey(byte[] digitalProductId)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Possible alpha-numeric characters in product key.Di2015NewLine    const string digits = "BCDFGHJKMPQRTVWXY2346789";Di2015NewLine    // Length of decoded product key in byte-form. Each byte represents 2 chars.Di2015NewLine    const int decodeStringLength = 15;Di2015NewLine    // Decoded product key is of length 29Di2015NewLine    char[] decodedChars = new char[29];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Extract encoded product key from bytes [52,67]Di2015NewLine    List<byte> hexPid = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 52; i <= 67; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hexPid.Add(digitalProductId[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Decode charactersDi2015NewLine    for (int i = decodedChars.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Every sixth char is a separator.Di2015NewLine        if ((i + 1) % 6 == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            decodedChars[i] = '-';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Do the actual decoding.Di2015NewLine            int digitMapIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = decodeStringLength - 1; j >= 0; j--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int byteValue = (digitMapIndex << 8) | (byte)hexPid[j];Di2015NewLine                hexPid[j] = (byte)(byteValue / 24);Di2015NewLine                digitMapIndex = byteValue % 24;Di2015NewLine                decodedChars[i] = digits[digitMapIndex];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new string(decodedChars);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13858152Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string AddIncrementFileNameSuffix(string path, IList<string> paths, string separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(path);Di2015NewLine    string ext = Path.GetExtension(path);Di2015NewLine    string fileName = Path.GetFileName(path);Di2015NewLine    string[] tokens = fileName.Split(new[] { separator }, StringSplitOptions.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int num = 0;Di2015NewLine    int.TryParse(tokens.Last(), out num);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dups = paths.Where(n => n.Equals(path, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine    while (dups.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        path = Path.Combine(dir, tokens.First() + separator + ++num + ext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    paths.Add(path);Di2015NewLine    return path;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13859539Di2015UniqueSeparator// I need to know the last item checkedDi2015NewLineprivate ListViewItem lastItemChecked;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void listView_ItemCheck(object sender, ItemCheckEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if we have the lastItem set as checked, and it is differentDi2015NewLine    // item than the one that fired the event, uncheck itDi2015NewLine    if (lastItemChecked != null && lastItemChecked.CheckedDi2015NewLine        && lastItemChecked != listView.Items[e.Index] )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // uncheck the last item and store the new oneDi2015NewLine        lastItemChecked.Checked = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // store current itemDi2015NewLine    lastItemChecked = listView.Items[e.Index];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13864515Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Active Kinect sensorDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private KinectSensor sensor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Execute startup tasksDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">object sending the event</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">event arguments</param>Di2015NewLine    private void WindowLoaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Look through all sensors and start the first connected one.Di2015NewLine        // This requires that a Kinect is connected at the time of app startup.Di2015NewLine        // To make your app robust against plug/unplug, Di2015NewLine        // it is recommended to use KinectSensorChooser provided in Microsoft.Kinect.ToolkitDi2015NewLine        foreach (var potentialSensor in KinectSensor.KinectSensors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (potentialSensor.Status == KinectStatus.Connected)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.sensor = potentialSensor;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (null != this.sensor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Turn on the color stream to receive color framesDi2015NewLine            this.sensor.ColorStream.Enable(ColorImageFormat.InfraredResolution640x480Fps30);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add an event handler to be called whenever there is new color frame dataDi2015NewLine            this.sensor.ColorFrameReady += this.SensorColorFrameReady;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start the sensor!Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.sensor.Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (IOException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.sensor = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Execute shutdown tasksDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">object sending the event</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">event arguments</param>Di2015NewLine    private void WindowClosing(object sender, System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (null != this.sensor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.sensor.Stop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13864515Di2015UniqueSeparatorKinectWpfViewers
13864515Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MainViewModel : ViewModelBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly KinectSensorChooser _sensorChooser = new KinectSensorChooser();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the MainViewModel class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public MainViewModel(IDataService dataService)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (IsInDesignMode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do something special, only for design modeDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            KinectSensorManager = new KinectSensorManager();Di2015NewLine            KinectSensorManager.KinectSensorChanged += OnKinectSensorChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _sensorChooser.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_sensorChooser.Kinect == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Unable to detect an available Kinect Sensor");Di2015NewLine                Application.Current.Shutdown();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Bind the KinectSensor from the sensorChooser to the KinectSensor on the KinectSensorManagerDi2015NewLine            var kinectSensorBinding = new Binding("Kinect") { Source = _sensorChooser };Di2015NewLine            BindingOperations.SetBinding(this.KinectSensorManager, KinectSensorManager.KinectSensorProperty, kinectSensorBinding);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Kinect Discovery & SetupDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnKinectSensorChanged(object sender, KinectSensorManagerEventArgs<KinectSensor> args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (null != args.OldValue)Di2015NewLine            UninitializeKinectServices(args.OldValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (null != args.NewValue)Di2015NewLine            InitializeKinectServices(KinectSensorManager, args.NewValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initialize Kinect based services.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="kinectSensorManager"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sensor"></param>Di2015NewLine    private void InitializeKinectServices(KinectSensorManager kinectSensorManager, KinectSensor sensor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // configure the color streamDi2015NewLine        kinectSensorManager.ColorFormat = ColorImageFormat.RgbResolution640x480Fps30;Di2015NewLine        kinectSensorManager.ColorStreamEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // configure the depth streamDi2015NewLine        kinectSensorManager.DepthStreamEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        kinectSensorManager.TransformSmoothParameters =Di2015NewLine            new TransformSmoothParametersDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // as the smoothing value is increased responsiveness to the raw dataDi2015NewLine                // decreases; therefore, increased smoothing leads to increased latency.Di2015NewLine                Smoothing = 0.5f,Di2015NewLine                // higher value corrects toward the raw data more quickly,Di2015NewLine                // a lower value corrects more slowly and appears smoother.Di2015NewLine                Correction = 0.5f,Di2015NewLine                // number of frames to predict into the future.Di2015NewLine                Prediction = 0.5f,Di2015NewLine                // determines how aggressively to remove jitter from the raw data.Di2015NewLine                JitterRadius = 0.05f,Di2015NewLine                // maximum radius (in meters) that filtered positions can deviate from raw data.Di2015NewLine                MaxDeviationRadius = 0.04fDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // configure the skeleton streamDi2015NewLine        sensor.SkeletonFrameReady += OnSkeletonFrameReady;Di2015NewLine        kinectSensorManager.SkeletonStreamEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // initialize the gesture recognizerDi2015NewLine        _gestureController = new GestureController();Di2015NewLine        _gestureController.GestureRecognized += OnGestureRecognized;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        kinectSensorManager.KinectSensorEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!kinectSensorManager.KinectSensorAppConflict)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // set up addition Kinect based services hereDi2015NewLine            // (e.g., SpeechRecognizer)Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        kinectSensorManager.ElevationAngle = Settings.Default.KinectAngle;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Uninitialize all Kinect services that were initialized in InitializeKinectServices.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sensor"></param>Di2015NewLine    private void UninitializeKinectServices(KinectSensor sensor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sensor.SkeletonFrameReady -= this.OnSkeletonFrameReady;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion Kinect Discovery & SetupDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region  //Create a StreamReader objectDi2015NewLine    reader = new StreamReader(fileToOpen);Di2015NewLine    //Create a Verdana font with size 10Di2015NewLine    lucida10Font = new Font("Lucida Console", 10);Di2015NewLine    //Create a PrintDocument objectDi2015NewLine    PrintDocument pd = new PrintDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PaperSize paperSize = new PaperSize("Custom", 400, 1097);Di2015NewLine    paperSize.RawKind = (int)PaperKind.Custom;Di2015NewLine    pd.DefaultPageSettings.PaperSize = paperSize;Di2015NewLine    pd.DefaultPageSettings.Margins = new Margins(20, 20, 30, 30);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    pd.PrinterSettings.PrinterName = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["journalNotePrinter"];Di2015NewLine    pd.DocumentName = this.filenameToDownload;Di2015NewLine    //Add PrintPage event handlerDi2015NewLine    pd.PrintPage += new PrintPageEventHandler(this.PrintTextFileHandler);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Call Print MethodDi2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        pd.Print();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finally {Di2015NewLine        //Close the readerDi2015NewLine        if (reader != null) {Di2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.savedJnt = fileToOpen.Replace("txt", "jnt");Di2015NewLine        System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(this.savedJnt)) {Di2015NewLine            lblJntSaved.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine            lblJntSaved.ForeColor = Color.Green;Di2015NewLine            lblJntSaved.Text = "File successfully located.";Di2015NewLine            // If 13868614Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FileSystemWatcher fsw = new FileSystemWatcher();Di2015NewLine            fsw.Path = @"D:\\test";Di2015NewLine            fsw.Deleted += new FileSystemEventHandler(ReportChange); Di2015NewLine            fsw.Created += new FileSystemEventHandler(ReportChange);Di2015NewLine            fsw.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.In.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ReportChange(object source, FileSystemEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Specify what is done when a file is created or deleted.Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("File: " + e.FullPath + " " + e.ChangeType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13868689Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[] array = null;Di2015NewLineDoSort(array)Di2015NewLine//array is still nullDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDoSort(int[] array)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine array = new int[10];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13868768Di2015UniqueSeparators
13868768Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble h = 0.707106781 * s; // Half diagonalDi2015NewLinedouble angle = rotation_angle + 0.25 * Math.PI; // 0.25 * Math.PI = 45 degreesDi2015NewLine                                                // inclination of the diagonal.Di2015NewLinedouble x = h * Math.Cos(angle);Di2015NewLinedouble y = h * Math.Sin(angle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The four points areDi2015NewLinep1x = +x + squareCenterX;Di2015NewLinep1y = +y + squareCenterY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinep2x = -y + squareCenterX;Di2015NewLinep2y = +x + squareCenterY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinep3x = -x + squareCenterX;Di2015NewLinep3y = -y + squareCenterY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinep4x = +y + squareCenterX;Di2015NewLinep4y = -x + squareCenterY;Di2015NewLine
13868771Di2015UniqueSeparator/* Get an array of Types for each of your columns.Di2015NewLine * Open the data file for reading.Di2015NewLine * Create your DataTable and add the columns.Di2015NewLine * (You have already done all of these in your earlier processing.)Di2015NewLine * Di2015NewLine * Note:    For the sake of generality, I've used an IEnumerable<string> Di2015NewLine * to represent the lines in the file, although for large files,Di2015NewLine * you would use a FileStream or TextReader etc.Di2015NewLine*/      Di2015NewLineIList<Type> columnTypes;        //array or list of the Type to use for each columnDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<string> fileLines;  //the lines to parse from the file.Di2015NewLineDataTable table;                //the table you'll add the rows toDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint colCount = columnTypes.Count;Di2015NewLinevar typeCodes = new TypeCode[colCount];Di2015NewLinevar converters = new TypeConverter[colCount];Di2015NewLine//Fill up the typeCodes array with the Type.GetTypeCode() of each column type.Di2015NewLine//If the TypeCode is Object, then get a custom converter for that column.Di2015NewLinefor(int i = 0; i < colCount; i++) {Di2015NewLine    typeCodes[i] = Type.GetTypeCode(columnTypes[i]);Di2015NewLine    if (typeCodes[i] == TypeCode.Object)Di2015NewLine        converters[i] = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(columnTypes[i]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Probably faster to build up an array of objects and insert them into the row all at once.Di2015NewLineobject[] vals = new object[colCount];Di2015NewLineobject val;Di2015NewLineforeach(string line in fileLines) {Di2015NewLine    //delineate the line into columns, however you see fit. I'll assume a tab character.Di2015NewLine    var columns = line.Split('\\t');Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < colCount) {Di2015NewLine        switch(typeCodes[i]) {Di2015NewLine            case TypeCode.String:Di2015NewLine                val = columns[i]; break;Di2015NewLine            case TypeCode.Int32:Di2015NewLine                val = int.Parse(columns[i]); break;Di2015NewLine            case TypeCode.DateTime:Di2015NewLine                val = DateTime.Parse(columns[i]); break;Di2015NewLine            //...list types that you expect to encounter often.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //finally, deal with other objectsDi2015NewLine            case TypeCode.Object:Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                val = converters[i].ConvertFromString(columns[i]);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        vals[i] = val;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Add all values to the row at one time. Di2015NewLine    //This might be faster than adding each column one at a time.Di2015NewLine    //There are two ways to do this:Di2015NewLine    var row = table.Rows.Add(vals); //create new row on the fly.Di2015NewLine    // OR Di2015NewLine    row.ItemArray = vals; //(e.g. allows setting existing row, created previously)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13869026Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string ConvertDate(string toConvert)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(toConvert)) { return ""; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[] dateFormats = new string[]{"MMddyy","MMddyyyy","MM/dd/yy","MM/dd/yyyy"};Di2015NewLine    DateTime date;Di2015NewLine    bool success = false;Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0;i<dateFormats.Length &&!success;i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        success = DateTime.TryParseExact(toConvert,Di2015NewLine        dateFormats[i],Di2015NewLine            new CultureInfo("en-US"),Di2015NewLine            DateTimeStyles.None,Di2015NewLine            out date);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!success) throw new Exception("Date formats are not recognized");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return date.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13869026Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string ConvertDate(string toConvert)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(toConvert)) { return ""; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[] dateFormats = new string[]{"MMddyy","MMddyyyy","MM/dd/yy","MM/dd/yyyy"};Di2015NewLine    DateTime date;Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0;i<dateFormats.Length ;i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(DateTime.TryParseExact(toConvert, dateFormats[i], new CultureInfo("en-US"), DateTimeStyles.None, out date))Di2015NewLine            return date.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Date formats are not recognized");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13869567Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class RestClientExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static Task<IRestResponse> ExecuteTask (this IRestClient restClient, RestRequest restRequest)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<IRestResponse> ();Di2015NewLine            restClient.ExecuteAsync (restRequest, (restResponse, asyncHandle) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (restResponse.ResponseStatus == ResponseStatus.Error)Di2015NewLine                    tcs.SetException (restResponse.ErrorException);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    tcs.SetResult (restResponse);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13869605Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TheEventArgs WatchEvent(this InteractionQueue this)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ret = Observable.Create<TheEventArgs>(subj => {Di2015NewLine        // This entire block gets called every time someone calls SubscribeDi2015NewLine        var disp = new CompositeDisposable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Subscribe to the eventDi2015NewLine        disp.Add(Observable.FromEventPattern(iq, "TheEvent").Subscribe(subj));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Stop watching when we're doneDi2015NewLine        disp.Add(Disposable.Create(() => iq.StopWatching());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        iq.StartWatching();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This is what to Dispose on UnsubscribeDi2015NewLine        return disp;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // When > 1 person Subscribes, only call the block above (i.e. StartWatching) onceDi2015NewLine    return ret.Multicast(new Subject<TheEventArgs>()).RefCount();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
