13870835Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Authorizes any authenticated user *except* those who match the provided Users or Roles.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class DoNotAuthorizeAttribute : AuthorizeAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is effectively a copy of the MVC source for AuthorizeCore with true/false logic swapped.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="httpContext">The HTTP context, which encapsulates all HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>true if the user is authorized; otherwise, false.</returns>Di2015NewLine    protected override bool AuthorizeCore(HttpContextBase httpContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (httpContext == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("httpContext");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        IPrincipal user = httpContext.User;Di2015NewLine        if (!user.Identity.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] usersSplit = SplitString(Users);Di2015NewLine        if ((usersSplit.Length > 0) && usersSplit.Contains<string>(user.Identity.Name, StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] rolesSplit = SplitString(Roles);Di2015NewLine        if ((rolesSplit.Length > 0) && rolesSplit.Any<string>(new Func<string, bool>(user.IsInRole)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is a direct copy of the MVC source for the internal SplitString method.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="original">The original string to split.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An array of strings.</returns>Di2015NewLine    internal static string[] SplitString(string original)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(original))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new string[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (from piece in original.Split(new[] { ',' })Di2015NewLine                let trimmed = piece.Trim()Di2015NewLine                where !string.IsNullOrEmpty(trimmed)Di2015NewLine                select trimmed).ToArray<string>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13870892Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing (SqlDataReader dr = command.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tb = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    tb.Load(dr);Di2015NewLine    return tb;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13873017Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringBuilder outputDoc = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// loop through the headers in the attributesDi2015NewLine// a struct which decomposes the information gleaned from the attributesDi2015NewLineList<OrderedProperties> orderedProperties = new List<OrderedProperties>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get the properties for my objectDi2015NewLinePropertyInfo[] props =Di2015NewLine    (typeof(PartsOrder)).GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// loop the propertiesDi2015NewLineforeach (PropertyInfo prop in props)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // check for a custom attributeDi2015NewLine    if (prop.GetCustomAttributesData().Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (object o in prop.GetCustomAttributes(false))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ExportOptionsAttribute exoa = o as ExportOptionsAttribute;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (exoa != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                orderedProperties.Add(new OrderedProperties() { OrderByValue = exoa.Order, PropertyName = prop.Name, Header = exoa.Header, Export = exoa.Export });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineorderedProperties = orderedProperties.Where(op => op.Export == true).OrderBy(op => op.OrderByValue).ThenBy(op => op.PropertyName).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var a in orderedProperties)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    outputDoc.AppendFormat("{0},", a.Header);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// remove the trailing commma and append a new lineDi2015NewLineoutputDoc.Remove(outputDoc.Length - 1, 1);Di2015NewLineoutputDoc.AppendFormat("\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar PartsOrderType = typeof(PartsOrder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//TODO: loop rowsDi2015NewLineforeach (PartsOrder price in this.Orders)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (OrderedProperties op in orderedProperties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // invokes the property on the object without knowing the name of the propertyDi2015NewLine        outputDoc.AppendFormat("{0},", PartsOrderType.InvokeMember(op.PropertyName, BindingFlags.GetProperty, null, price, null));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // remove the trailing comma and append a new lineDi2015NewLine    outputDoc.Remove(outputDoc.Length - 1, 1);Di2015NewLine    outputDoc.AppendFormat("\\n");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

e.SetValue(PropertyProperty, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // When the value changes do the fadeout-switch-fadein      Di2015NewLine    private static void BindingChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Storyboard fadeout = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine        var fadeoutAnim = new DoubleAnimation() { To = 0, Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(0.3)) };Di2015NewLine        Storyboard.SetTarget(fadeoutAnim, d);Di2015NewLine        Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(fadeoutAnim, new PropertyPath("Opacity"));Di2015NewLine        fadeout.Children.Add(fadeoutAnim);Di2015NewLine        fadeout.Completed += (d1, d2) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var propName = GetProperty(d);Di2015NewLine            if (propName != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var prop = d.GetType().GetProperty(propName);Di2015NewLine                var binding = GetBinding(d);Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(d, binding, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Storyboard fadein = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine };Di2015NewLine        fadeout.Begin();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
